long_description: The Chione headband by The North Face is reversible to give you two looks to choose from. It features an embroidered logo on one side and a Jacquard woven logo on the other. Wide headband provides coverage for your ears; soft acrylic fabric feels great next to skin.
short_description: The Chione headband by The North Face is reversible to give you two looks to choose from. It features an embroidered logo on one side and a Jacquard woven logo on the other.
